job_tasks.phrase: You'll be working on providing a state-of-the-art centralized platform around generative AI to CM.com customers where they can manage and control their generative AI powered assistants.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and maintaining a platform, which is a traditional software engineering task, specifically focused on integrating generative AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role involves building the functionality and control mechanisms for LLMs within a platform, aligning with software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Back-End Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the scalability and reliability of our existing platform while collaborating closely with the team to design and implement cutting-edge solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights core backend engineering responsibilities focused on platform development, scalability, reliability, and implementing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: You will integrate AI capabilities developed by our data scientists and ML engineers with traditional software engineering practices to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
job_tasks.justification: This is a key phrase defining the role as integrating existing AI capabilities into software products, which is a core aspect of AI-Adjacent Software Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built CMS customers can use to easily manage the data in their knowledge base, synchronize their knowledge base with external systems while also preparing the data for our inference engine.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a specific software component (CMS) for managing data, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: A custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automationâ€¦).
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the development of a custom inference engine, a core software engineering task for an AI-powered product.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement clearly positions the role as a 'Backend Developer' focused on building and integrating a platform that utilizes Generative AI. The responsibilities involve developing software components like a CMS and an inference engine, and integrating AI capabilities developed by others. The core of the work is software engineering, with AI being a key feature of the product being built, rather than the primary focus of model development or specialization. This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a Backend Developer and explicitly states the integration of AI capabilities into a platform. The distinction between building the platform and developing the AI models themselves is well-defined, leading to a high confidence in the profile assignment.
